variables.input:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs" AND eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event"
| fields resource.deployment.release.name

fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event"
| fields resource.stagename

fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete"
//| dedup buildnumber
| fields buildnumber

0.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete"
| filter result == "succeeded"
| summarize count(), by: result

1.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete"
| filter result == "failed"
| summarize count(), by: result

2.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete"
| filter result == "canceled"
| summarize count(), by: result

3.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete"
| filter result == "partiallySucceeded"
| summarize count(), by: result

4.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete" and result == "succeeded"
| summarize `Build Count`=count(), by: buildnumber
| filter in(buildnumber, array($BuildNumber))
| fieldsRename `Build Number`=buildnumber
| sort `Build Count` desc

5.title: Build Reason
5.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete" and result == "succeeded"
| summarize count=count(), by: reason
| sort count desc

6.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete" and result == "failed"
| summarize `Build Count`=count(), by: buildnumber
| filter in(buildnumber, array($BuildNumber))
| fieldsRename `Build Number`=buildnumber
| sort `Build Count` desc

9.title: Build Reason
9.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete" and result == "failed"
| summarize count=count(), by: reason
| sort count desc

12.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete" and result == "partiallySucceeded"
| summarize `Build Count`=count(), by: buildnumber
| filter in(buildnumber, array($BuildNumber))
| fieldsRename `Build Number`=buildnumber
| sort `Build Count` desc

13.title: Build Reason
13.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete" and result == "partiallySucceeded"
| summarize count=count(), by: reason
| sort count desc

14.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete" and result == "canceled"
| summarize `Build Count`=count(), by: buildnumber
| filter in(buildnumber, array($BuildNumber))
| fieldsRename `Build Number`=buildnumber
| sort `Build Count` desc

15.title: Build Reason
15.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "build.complete" and result == "canceled"
| summarize count=count(), by: reason
| sort count desc

17.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" and resource.environment.status == "succeeded"
| summarize count(), by: {resource.environment.status}

19.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" and resource.environment.status == "succeeded"
| summarize `Release Count`=count(), by: {resource.deployment.release.name}
| filter in(resource.deployment.release.name, array($ReleaseName))
| fieldsRename `Release Name`= resource.deployment.release.name
| sort `Release Count` desc

20.title: Release Stage
20.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" and resource.environment.status == "succeeded"
| summarize count=count(), by:{resource.stagename}
| filter in(resource.stagename,array($ReleaseStage))
| sort count desc

22.title: Release Project
22.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" and resource.environment.status == "succeeded"
| summarize count(), by:{resource.project.name}

23.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" and resource.environment.status == "rejected"
| summarize count(), by:{resource.environment.status}

24.title: Release Stage
24.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" and resource.environment.status == "rejected"
| filter in(resource.stagename,array($ReleaseStage))
| summarize count(), by:{resource.stagename}

25.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" and resource.environment.status == "rejected"
| summarize `Release Count`=count(), by: {resource.deployment.release.name}
| filter in(resource.deployment.release.name, array($ReleaseName))
| fieldsRename `Release Name`=resource.deployment.release.name
| sort `Release Count` desc

26.title: Release Project
26.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" and resource.environment.status == "rejected"
| summarize count(), by:{resource.project.name}

30.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" //and resource.environment.status == "rejected"
| parse `resource.deployment.startedon`, "TIMESTAMP('yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.S'):DeployStartTime LD"
| parse `resource.deployment.completedon`, "TIMESTAMP('yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.S'):DeployEndTime LD"
| fields DeployDuration=DeployEndTime-DeployStartTime
| filterOut isNull(DeployDuration)
| summarize avg(DeployDuration)

32.title: Duration by Release
32.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" //and resource.environment.status == "rejected"
| parse `resource.deployment.startedon`, "TIMESTAMP('yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSS'):DeployStartTime LD"
| parse `resource.deployment.completedon`, "TIMESTAMP('yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSSSS'):DeployEndTime LD"
| fields DeployDuration=DeployEndTime-DeployStartTime, resource.deployment.release.name
| filterOut isNull(DeployDuration)
| filter in(resource.deployment.release.name, array($ReleaseName))
| sort DeployDuration desc

33.title: Deployment Frequency by Release & Timestamp
33.query:
fetch logs
| filter dt.system.bucket == "azure_devops_logs"
| filter eventtype == "ms.vss-release.deployment-completed-event" and resource.environment.status == "succeeded"
| fields timestamp,resource.environment.status,resource.deployment.release.name
| makeTimeseries count(), by:{resource.deployment.release.name},interval:15m
| filter in(resource.deployment.release.name, array($ReleaseName))
